title: Fps heavy drops since today
body:
My game have heavy fps drop, only today start to have this, everything was fine yesterday.  Fps drops all the game, all the time doenst matter the action that i have on my gameplay, please fix this riot, the game is unplayable this way, i didnt change a thing on my pc so isnt my pc for sure (sorry for my bad english )
Asus Gl502VM
i7 6700 
Nvidia 1060 6gb
16gb Ram

replies.body: I'm curious if Snowdown assets could be causing this.  What happens if you disable that via in-game options?
I will try and them i tell you, but yes is strange
i did one game and enable v-sync apper to help, but my fps stay locked at 60, but the drop is minimun
